data.title: Glasgow Whisky's selection of Blended Whiskies — Glasgow Whisky
data.meta_description: Glasgow Whisky has Seven brands of Blended Whisky in a range of ages
data.text:
SAVOUR THE MOMENT

For those who love whisky HIGHLAND CUP 12 Year Old will not disappoint. This deluxe mature Scotch is a stunning blend of some of the most luxurious, oak aged, 12 year old single Malt and Grain Whiskies. HIGHLAND CUP 12 Year Old offers a well balanced dram that is best appreciated either neat or with a splash of Highland water – and is the perfect way to end the day.

A TIME HONOURED WHISKY OF DISTINCTION

Like its majestic sailing ship namesake THE STRATHALLAN is taking the delights of fine Scottish Whisky around the World.

Traditionally blended, from an unusually high number of superb Scottish Malt and Single Grain Whiskies, THE STRATHALLAN rewards both connoisseur and newcomer, with a character that’s round, smooth and sweet with a complex finish of butterscotch. In a time honoured fashion, THE STRATHALLAN can be enjoyed straight or with a little water. And if the mood takes, it has sufficient depth of flavour and character to be the perfect partner to any mixer or cocktail.

A RITE OF PASSAGE FOREVER REMEMBERED

Your first sip of a fine old Scotch Whisky will never be forgotten. Imagine what complex characters await your taste buds following the first sip of Strathallan 12 Year Old – a blend of the finest 12 year old Single Malts and 12 Single Grain Whiskies, matured in selected oak casks that have been skillfully crafted and maintained by the artisan skills of time served coopers using similar techniques and tools used in former times to build wooden sailing ships that travelled the globe. The tantalizing aroma and bouquet of Strahallan 12 Year Old and its distinctive colour should alert your senses that this is a dram to savour for evermore.

A WHISKY WITH TWO SIDES TO SAVOUR

KELVIN BRIDGE Scotch Whisky spans tastes. It is especially blended to be enjoyable at anytime of the day or night. It’s easy drinking style is superb as a neat dram or perfect with a splash of water. On one side it mingles easily with mixers, while the other side of its character offers a sound basis for cocktails. And just like Glasgow’s iconic KELVIN BRIDGE, this Whisky links a cosmopolitan style with a fashionable young and dynamic taste. You’ll never regret crossing over to KELVIN BRIDGE Scotch Whisky.

SPEND TIME WITH A TRUE FRIEND

There’s nothing more rewarding than time spent enjoying a fine and rewarding dram with good company. And there’s no better drop of whisky to share, than

SCOTTISH FRIEND.

It’s a wonderful Blended Scotch Whisky with a character and definition that shows its lineage - crafted from a selection of Scotch Malt Whiskies and Scotch Grain Whiskies drawn from distilleries across Scotland, all of which have been aged in oak barrels for a minimum of three years.

Furthermore, just like a true friend it will always be easy to get on with. SCOTTISH FRIEND can be enjoyed with a drop of water or, due to its character, can happily form the basis of a Whisky cocktail.

Let SCOTTISH FRIEND Blended Scotch Whisky be your preferred acquaintance from bonnie Scotland.
